title: Cleaner and Silo Expansion for Soy Beans

title: Soy Oil Filling Line Automation Changes

title: Schuler Stamping Press Ford
description: Automation improvement, troubleshooting, commissioning, and service for Ford stamping press operations.

title: Wire Harness Oven BMW

title: Marriage Line BMW Spartanburg SC
description: PLC and Robot integration in the marriage line for powertrain and car body assembly at BMW Spartanburg facility.

title: Chicago Tower Bodyshop
description: Bodyshop PLC integration project using Rockwell equipment for automotive manufacturing operations.
